snippet: The fall classical music season is wide-ranging, from Laurie Anderson’s timely take on the presidential election to the timeless Christmastime unfurlings of the Messiah.
lead_paragraph: The fall classical music season is wide-ranging, from Laurie Anderson’s timely take on the presidential election to the timeless Christmastime unfurlings of the Messiah.

headline.seo: Classical Music’s Fall Season in New York
